gobblin.runtime

Class JobContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.runtime.JobContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class JobContext
extends Object
implements Closeable
    A class carrying context information of a Gobblin job.
